reviews.review_msg: Really great prof who wants you to succeed! He's very nice when you ask him questions and he is always willing to help. One of my fave profs at SFU. My 1st REM class btw. His lectures r a bit disorganized but it falls in place by the end. He engages the class w/ Qs during class. You learn lots on the final project- do ask him lots of Qs! Great!

He is such a nice soul. He loves his job and he genuinely gets happy when his students understand and ask questions. Always smiling and always helpful. One of the best gem profs SFU has seen. Very valuable and knowledgeable. The negative reviews come from 1st years who dont know the structure of REM courses. THIS PROF IS AWESOME.

Really enjoyed his REM 445 course. He is enthusiastic, knowledgeable and breaks things down into easy to grasp bites. He is also very understanding of personal affairs and is quite reasonable and curious to requests for extensions or re-dos. The final project for this course was a doozy - start early. Graded very fairly.
